pages.text: $(li)The Tarantula Hawk Wing Fragment is an item that can be used to craft a $(l:patchouli:decoration/alexsmobs/banner_patterns)Banner Pattern$(/l) or a $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/alexsmobs/tarantula_hawk_wing)Tarantula Hawk Wing$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).
pages.title: T. Tarantula Hawk Wing
